phrases: The same footage played back on the television, over and over.
Tebwa Rocket Accident
Communications with the Novyi Baikonur launch site have ceased.
We are still awaiting details of the accident.
Tebwa Rocket Accident
Half a day has passed since the rocket accident, and we still do not know if Kud's mom is safe or not.
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
takaku tobe takaku sora he
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku tobe takaku sora he
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
sono ashi wa arukidasu
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
sono ashi wa arukidasu
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
yagate kuru kakoku mo
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
yagate kuru kakoku mo
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
From satellite imagery of the site,
the entirety of Novyi Baikonur has been caught in the explosion.
It appears that a large conflagration is spreading through the area.
Because the rocket's experimental reactor may have exploded,
there is a chance of biological hazard...
The situation is just getting worse.
We still do not know if there are survivors or not.
What the hell?
The rocket did not just explode?
Why did this have to happen?
Why does everything have to be beyond our control?
Anything can happen.
No one ever thinks it will until it does.
What will happen, happens.
That is how the world is.
The most important thing is to not let the tragedy defeat you.
To believe that you can get through it.
Kud!
Kud-o!
Kuu-chan!
Kudryavka!
Kuu-chan...
I remember...
I remember everything...
I was... in prison.
Prison?
Calm down, Kudryavka.
It is okay, Kuu-chan.
We are all here for you.
That night, Kud returned to the dorms.
The next day, she did not go to school.
All we could do was worry.
Look.
Tebwa
Rocket
Failure
Experimental
Reactor
Explosion?
They are saying it is even more likely that the experimental reactor exploded.
To reduce risk of contamination, travel to and from Tebwa has been restricted.
What is that mean?
Basically, it is dangerous in there, so it will be harder to get in or leave.
Do we still not have any updates on the crew?
Kuu-chan's so worried about her mom that she cannot take it anymore.
I am sure she wants to go back home to Tebwa.
But no one can get into Tebwa.
The Tebwan Embassy...
just sent Kudryavka a plane ticket.
Her mother is a hero in Tebwa.
She received special permission to enter as her daughter.
Just to see if she is safe.
People from the embassy are coming for her tomorrow.
So, Kud's going back to Tebwa?
But it is dangerous!
She might not come back if she does!
But...
Kuu-chan wants to see her mom...
And I am sure her mom is safe and waiting for her...
Do not you think so too, Rin-chan?
do not know.
But...
Her mom might already be...
If she goes home...
she will just feel sad!
Rin!
Rin...
She should not go home.
She does not have to see sad or scary things.
I feel bad for Kud.
G-Good morning!
No, I mean...
Good afternoon!
No, I mean...
Um, uh...
Kud, you do not need to mind us.
But I am causing trouble for you all...
That does not matter.
The most important thing right now is you and your mom.
I heard you got a plane ticket.
Are you going back to Tebwa?
What should I do?
I want to see my mom.
But...
I cannot go back to Tebwa.
Because I came hereto Japan...
to escape.
To escape?
Will you listen to my story?
It is just a silly one.
When I was a kid, I looked up to my mom.
I did not tell anyone, but I dreamed of being a kosmonaut.
Wait, Kunya, what did you just say?
You want to be a kosmonaut?
Yes.
You want to be an astronaut...
I have never been happier in my life!
Kudryavka!
Kudryavka.
I am so glad I gave you that name.
The first dog in space, Laika.
One small life gave hope to all of mankind.
Kudryavka became a key gear of the world.
Become a gear of the world, just like her.
A good gear.
Wafu!
And one year ago, I was admitted into Tebwa's aviation school.
Aviation school?
An educational facility for aspiring kosmonauts.
I studied so I could fulfill my dream.
But in reality, it did not go as well as I had thought.
You need to speak Russian and English in space,
so the lessons were all in English.
I could not keep up at all.
Hard work did not pay off.
My mom was so talented,
and yet I was useless.
They called me a waste of their tax money.
Stupid, is not it?
After all that effort, this was all I could be.
I thought I could not be my mom's daughter.
I left the school after half a year.
I came all the way to Japan without telling my mom.
And even here, I am half worthless.
Not one or the other.
Nothing.
Useless to the world.
A failure of a gear.
I wonder how disappointed my mom is with my weakness.
So I will not go back to Tebwa.
Is not Kud's weakness something everyone has?
Rin looked away, as though looking away from herself.
So that is how it is.
Kud-o does not know what to do.
What now?
What do you think, Masato?
Like I could answer a tough question like that!
Riki, you think of something.
You are good at that, are not you?
I think Kud should go home.
I am worried about her mom.
But if she is not ready to go back...
If she does not go, she will regret it.
She may never get another chance to see her mother.
Kudryavka.
Rather than staying here and regretting it,
it may be better to go and regret it.
If you do not move forward, you cannot gain anything.
Kud.
I-I know!
I have to go!
Um, uh...
But...
I am scared.
I want to stay here!
I want to stay with you all!
I will call the embassy!
I will give the plane ticket back!
This is what Kud decided.
There is nothing else we can do.
All I can ever do is run.
I cannot fly.
I cannot go.
I am Kudryavka.
It seems you have remembered everything.
You will just experience the same thing, the same time?
Has your wish changed?
No!
No!
No matter what you decide, Riki and the rest of us will not criticize you for it.
I am sorry, Kyousuke-san!
I am sure Kyousuke thinks Kud should go back home.
Telling someone to stand up to something is an easy task.
Just telling is easy.
I am not strong enough to tell Kud to face it.
No matter what you decide, you will regret it.
There is not a right answer.
Naoe-kun!
Suginami-san?
Are you not feeling well?
Uh... I am fine.
Here.
Class Trip Itinerary
Author: Saigusa Haruka
Bye.
Oh, right.
It is almost time for the class trip.
I doubt I can feel happy about it, though.
Saigusa Haruka
I am sure Saigusa-san feels the same way.
Maybe she is in the clubroom.
Nishizono Mio
What was that?
Rin, you need more muscle!
Shut up!
What is wrong, Riki?
What are you standing around for?
That box...
Oh, that too?
Are you going to burn it?
Yeah.
We are on day duty, after all.
Hold on a second.
Sure we do not need to check what is inside?
What if it is inflammable trash?
Hey, you are right!
It might be something edible!
Let us see here...
I have seen this stuff in Kud's room.
Hey, this is nice!
But it will not get me any more muscles...
Did Kud throw this away?
And I cannot eat it.
What is that?
Parts for something?
What is that?
A dog tag...
It is an ID tag.
Russian?
Kud-o wants to burn something this important?
Mind if I took this box with me for a while?
Space development.
After World War II, the Soviet Union launched the first manmade satellite.
Thirteen dogs went to space aboard the Sputniks.
Is not this...
That is it.
Chernushka.
In English, Blacky.
Kud's mom has black hair...
It is her mom's ID tag.
Space Engineering Theory.
Dewitt and Everett.
Saint-Exupery.
The Little Prince.
Kud's dreams are all in this box.
I proved why the sky is blue!
So exciting!
I proved why the sky is blue!
So exciting!
If Everett's many-worlds interpretation is true,
then there is an infinite number of Southern Crosses in this world!
It is so wonderful I might just faint!
I wrote a little essay about black holes and the theory of relativity last night.
It is embarrassing, so I will not let anyone read it.
Kud...
Congratulations on getting in, Kunya!
Mom!
This is the cloak and cap I have worn ever since I started at TASA.
I hope they will protect you in my place.
I am sorry!
So that cloak and cap...
were your mom's.
Are you just going to throw away your precious box?
Those are...
what remain of my dream.
It is all of my regrets.
I have no right to keep them.
I was not cut out to be a kosmonaut.
Do not lie.
No matter how much you deny them, you cannot extinguish your true feelings.
My true feelings?
You love space from the bottom of your heart.
You do not have to be like your mom.
You can be awkward and clumsy.
You just need to find what you can do.
You can be your own gear and chase your dream of space.
Your mom showed you that dream, and you looked up to her.
You want to see your mom.
You cannot run away from your feelings.
Sure, you are weak, and you might get an earful, but it does not matter.
You love your mom.
I will not run away anymore!
I want...
I want to see my mom!
I want to see her!
I am going to go see her!
My words were probably meant for myself.
That I should not run away.
Thank you, Riki!
Thank you!
Do you have your plane ticket?
Yes.
Take care on your trip.
Yes.
I will be lonely without you.
Strelka...
Belka...
Rin-san!
Could you please take care of Strelka and Belka for me?
Y-Yeah, I will.
Thank you.
Goodbye, then.
Make sure you listen to Rin-san.
Everyone...
The people at the embassy told me
that I might not be able to come back to Japan.
You will be able to!
It is a promise!
Definitely!
You are coming back here.
We will be waiting for you.
Yeah.
Yeah.
Coming back is your mission.
A mission that only you can complete.
I was trying to be someone else when I was with my mom.
I was not really myself.
No matter where I went, everyone laughed at me as weird.
That is why I was always alone.
But now I have all of you.
You have all accepted me for who I am.
I will come back for sure!
I will come back!
Wish me ni puha ni pera.
It is a curse for good luck.
Ni puha ni... pera?
Bye-bye.
Bye-bye, Kuu-chan.
We will be waiting for you, Noumi.
Proshaite.
Farewell
Kud left alone to face what great difficulties stood before her.

I will Come Back for Sure!

You will be able to smile after you cry,
kimi wa naita ato waraeru

hazu dakara tte ittan da
I said that because I know you can
hazu dakara tte ittan da
I said that because I know you can

You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment

I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
nakusanai you ni mahou kakete
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,

And I will not say good-bye
sayonara wo tsutaenai

You will start walking again one day
arukidasu yo mata itsuka

The situation in Tebwa was worse than we could imagine.
Unbelievable hardships awaited Kud when she arrived.
Is praying for her safety all we can do?
Kud's life is in danger!
